ARABIC: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: the Day they are shoved roughly into the Fire of Hell:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The day they are dragged and pushed into Hell,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: On the Day when they shall be thrust into Hell with a violent thrust (and shall be told):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On that day they will be violently pushed into the fire
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: A day when they will be pushed, forcibly shoved towards the fire of hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The Day when they will be pushed down by force to the fire of Hell, with a horrible, forceful pushing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The day on which they shall be driven away to the fire of hell with violence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: the day when they shall be pitched into the fire of Gehenna:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The day when they are thrust with a (disdainful) thrust, into the fire of hell
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: on that Day they shall be ruthlessly thrust into the Fire of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: On the Day whereon they will be pushed into Hell-Fire with a dreadful push.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: the day when they will be shoved forcibly toward the fire of hell, [and told:]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That Day shall they be thrust down to the Fire of Hell, irresistibly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The Day when they will be pushed down by force to the Fire of Hell, with a horrible, forceful pushing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On that Day when they shall be pitched into the Fire of Gehenna (Hell),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The Day when they are shoved into the Fire of Hell forcefully.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:13] the day when they will be thrust with a violent thrust into Hell, [when] they will be pushed violently (this [last clause, yawma yuda‘‘ūna ilā nāri jahannama da‘‘an] is a substitution for yawma tamūru, ‘the day when [the heaven] will heave’) and it will be said to them in reproach:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The day when they are thrust with a (disdainful) thrust into the Fire of hell) the angels drag them on their faces and thrust them in Gehenna.
